heading: HR00402
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT TO SERIOUSLY CONSIDER THE RECOMMENDATIONS AND PROPOSALS OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES IN THE CRAFTING AND PROMULGATION OF THE IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11310, ALSO KNOWN AS THE "PANTAWID PAMILYANG PILIPINO PROGRAM (4Ps) ACT, DEEMED TO BE IN FURTHERANCE OF THE LEGISLATIVE INTENT AND SPIRIT OF THE SAID LAW"
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00402
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT TO SERIOUSLY CONSIDER THE RECOMMENDATIONS AND PROPOSALS OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES IN THE CRAFTING AND PROMULGATION OF THE IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 11310, ALSO KNOWN AS THE "PANTAWID PAMILYANG PILIPINO PROGRAM (4Ps) ACT, DEEMED TO BE IN FURTHERANCE OF THE LEGISLATIVE INTENT AND SPIRIT OF THE SAID LAW"
